content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No new permanent structures have been successfully placed on the map. The agent made several attempts to establish a Lab at (0.5, 2.5) for research support, but all placement and crafting operations failed because of inventory shortages and missing sub-ingredients. Although processing units such as furnaces were identified and used for smelting (an iron smelting furnace at (5.0, 5.0) and a copper smelting furnace at (–27.0, –60.0)), these were only referenced for resource conversion and were not newly created or permanently placed by the agent.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• API Invocation Errors – When using get_entities:
  - Verify the function signature and use only the supported arguments. Avoid including unexpected keywords (e.g. “radius”) or an incorrect number of positional arguments.

• Lab Placement and Crafting Failures:
  - Confirm that the required Lab entity is present in the inventory before attempting placement.
  - Ensure that all necessary sub-ingredients (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, copper-cables, and copper-plates) are available to support Lab crafting.

• Collection Iteration Issues:
  - Validate that any collection (e.g. those returned by utility calls) is not None before iterating. Fallback to an empty list if the returned value is None.

• Resource Dependency Management:
  - Prior to triggering crafting or placement routines, check that upstream processes (such as smelting for iron or copper) yield sufficient outputs to meet subsequent part requirements.
